entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who lit his wand and looked out upon a deserted scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who had not packed any food in her magical bag and had collected wild mushrooms for them to eat.

entities.name: grimmauld place
entities.description: The location where they were supposed to return that night, but instead found themselves in a deserted clearing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who pushed his portion of the wild mushroom stew away due to feeling queasy.

relationships.description: Harry swapped places with Hermione at ten o'clock, as they were in a deserted clearing.
They were supposed to return to Grimmauld Place that night, but instead found themselves in a deserted clearing.
Hermione had collected wild mushrooms for them to eat, which Harry only persevered with so as not to hurt her feelings.
Ron ate the wild mushroom stew with Harry, but pushed his portion away due to feeling queasy.
